mapper.select: select usr.id as id, usr.display_name as displayName, usr.login as login from account_manager_retraining manager_retraining inner join sys_user usr on usr.id = manager_retraining.customer_manager_id and manager_retraining.retrain_id=#{retrainId}

select usr.id as id, usr.display_name as displayName, usr.login as login from (select * from sys_organization where id=#{orgId}) org inner join sys_department dep on org.id = dep.org_id inner join sys_dept_user dep_user on dep.id = dep_user.dept_id inner join sys_user usr on usr.id = dep_user.user_id and usr.user_type = 1 and usr.is_deleted = 0
